original: @233a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @233a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sa ha dza sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: sa ha dza sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
translated: Sahasambara-sadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs //
analyzed: bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs //
translated: The Means of Achievement of the Innate Supreme Bliss

original: 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Cakrasamvara

original: shes bya rnal 'byor cho ga gsum //
analyzed: shes bya rnal 'byor cho ga gsum //
translated: The three rites of yoga of the object of knowledge🔽Are consecration, complete imagination,

original: byin gyis rlob dang rab tu rtog / bsam bral gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob dang rab tu rtog / bsam bral gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs //
translated: And the perfect image free from thought.

original: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rnal 'byor du ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rnal 'byor du ;
translated: The yoga taught by the Buddha

original: / sems can rdzus te skyes pa bzhin //🔽gang zhig skad cig sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: / sems can rdzus te skyes pa bzhin // gang zhig skad cig sbyor ba yis //
translated: Is like the miraculous birth of a sentient being.🔽Whoever meditates without a seed

original: sa bon med par rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: sa bon med par rnam par bsgom //
translated: By the application of an instant

original: rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror gyur //
translated: Is transformed into Vajra dakini.

original: zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'dzin //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'dzin //
translated: She holds a half-moon on her head,

original: dpral bar thod pa'i phreng ba bsnams //
analyzed: dpral bar thod pa'i phreng ba bsnams //
translated: And a garland of skulls on her forehead.

original: phyag rgya drug ldan mgo bo'i phreng //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug ldan mgo bo'i phreng //
translated: She has the six symbolic ornaments and a garland of heads,

original: spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can //
analyzed: spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can //
translated: Has three eyes, and a crossed vajra.

original: sna tshogs padma nyi mar gnas //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma nyi mar gnas //
translated: She stands on a variegated lotus and sun,

original: 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas par dgod //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas par dgod //
translated: And tramples Bhairava and Kalarati.

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bcibs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bcibs //
translated: She stands with her right leg straight.

original: rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan //
translated: Holding a vajra, a bell, and a skull,🔽with the hair of the head tied up,🔽and with an Akṣobhya crest jewel,

original: gang cing mi bskyod spyi bo'i gtsug / stag gi pags pas yang dag bcings //
analyzed: gang cing mi bskyod spyi bo'i gtsug / stag gi pags pas yang dag bcings //
translated: and with a tiger skin as a lower garment,

original: dpa' bo'i rdo rje phag mo ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rdo rje phag mo ni //
translated: the hero Vajravārāhī,

original: @233b spyan gsum dmar zhing mgo phreng ldan //🔽rdo rje thod pa khrag gis bkang //
analyzed: @233b spyan gsum dmar zhing mgo phreng ldan // rdo rje thod pa khrag gis bkang //
translated: with three eyes, red, and with a garland of heads,🔽holding a vajra and a skull filled with blood,

original: rked rgyun dum bus mtshan pa 'dzin //
analyzed: rked rgyun dum bus mtshan pa 'dzin //
translated: and marked with a garland of bone ornaments,

original: phyogs kyi gos la phyag rgya lnga //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos la phyag rgya lnga //
translated: with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: dbu skra grol zhing sangs rgyas gtsug /'di ltar skad cig gis rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: dbu skra grol zhing sangs rgyas gtsug /'di ltar skad cig gis rdzogs pa'i //
translated: with loose hair, and with a crest of buddhas,

original: bdag nyid lus ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid lus ni bsgom par bya //
translated: one should visualize one’s body🔽in this way, complete in an instant.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs //
translated: The form that is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses

original: sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par spro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par spro //
translated: emits the light rays of the buddhas.

original: spyod yul gcig gi sems kyis su //
analyzed: spyod yul gcig gi sems kyis su //
translated: With a mind of a single field of experience,

original: 'di nyid kho na yun ring bsam //
analyzed: 'di nyid kho na yun ring bsam //
translated: contemplate this alone for a long time.

original: go 'phang 'di la sems can dgod //
analyzed: go 'phang 'di la sems can dgod //
translated: Place sentient beings in this state,

original: chos dbyings rgyal mtshan yang dag sbyor //🔽gnyis gnyis sbyor ba bde las phyung //
analyzed: chos dbyings rgyal mtshan yang dag sbyor // gnyis gnyis sbyor ba bde las phyung //
translated: the victory banner of the realm of phenomena.🔽The bliss that arises from the union of the two

original: dga' ba zag pa'i phun tshogs kyis//
analyzed: dga' ba zag pa'i phun tshogs kyis//
translated: is the perfection of the enjoyment of pleasure.

original: rang rig dga' bas yongs su khengs //
analyzed: rang rig dga' bas yongs su khengs //
translated: One is completely filled with the joy of self-awareness.

original: zag pas skyed par byed pa gang //
analyzed: zag pas skyed par byed pa gang //
translated: Whatever is produced by the contaminants

original: des ni rgya chen yid la byed //
analyzed: des ni rgya chen yid la byed //
translated: is the mental activity of the vast.

original: 'dus byas spros pa'i rgyun 'di ni //🔽'di ltar rtag tu sgom pa pos //
analyzed: 'dus byas spros pa'i rgyun 'di ni // 'di ltar rtag tu sgom pa pos //
translated: This continuum of fabricated proliferation🔽is always to be meditated upon

original: 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya //
analyzed: 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya //
translated: by the meditator as luminosity.

original: sna tshogs padma nyi ma dang // 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan no //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma nyi ma dang // 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan no //
translated: The various lotus, sun, Bhairava, and Kālarātri,

original: sdug ma bdag mo mkha' nor bu //
analyzed: sdug ma bdag mo mkha' nor bu //
translated: the chief of the beautiful ladies, the sky, and the jewel,🔽below the five tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi 'og / sku dang yan lag mchog dang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi 'og / sku dang yan lag mchog dang ni //
translated: the supreme body and limbs,

original: zla ba thig le n'a da rnams //
analyzed: zla ba thig le n'a da rnams //
translated: the moon, the drop, and the nada—🔽these should be gradually dissolved,

original: 'di rnams rim gyis mi snang gzhug / ji ltar me long dbus kyi rlung //
analyzed: 'di rnams rim gyis mi snang gzhug / ji ltar me long dbus kyi rlung //
translated: just as the wind in the center of a mirror

original: thams cad thim par gyur pa ltar //
analyzed: thams cad thim par gyur pa ltar //
translated: dissolves into everything.

original: yang dag mtha' ru yang nas yang //🔽de bzhin rnal 'byor rab tu gzhug / grub thob rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa'i /
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ru yang nas yang // de bzhin rnal 'byor rab tu gzhug / grub thob rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa'i /
translated: Again and again,🔽the yogī should be absorbed in the limit of reality,🔽just as the wind in the center of a mirror🔽dissolves into everything.

original: bde mchog lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: bde mchog lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The Sādhana of Coemergent Cakrasaṃvara by Siddha Vajraghanṭa is complete.

original: // / pandita rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lam ka'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: // / pandita rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lam ka'i zhal snga nas /
translated: The pandit Vajrasana and🔽the translator, the great scholar, the venerable Dharmakirti,

original: dpyal lo ts'a ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: dpyal lo ts'a ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: translated this text.
